ALBUM:{{ s.id}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { UsersService } from 'src/app/services/users.service'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user-album-photos', templateUrl: './user-album-photos.component.html', styles: [ ] }) export class UserAlbumPhotosComponent { album:any; UserId:any; constructor( public UService:UsersService){ this.UserId = myRoute.snapshot.params["id"]; } ngOnInit(): void { this.UService.GetAllAlbumsbyuserId().subscribe({ next:(data)=>{ // console.log(data) this.album = data; }, error:(err)=>{console.log(err)} }) } }
